sentences.sContent: Pompeii was a cultural center and vacation destination for Roman high society until it was destroyed in 79 A.D. by the eruption of Mount Vesuvius.
sentences.sCn: 公元79年维苏威火山爆发并摧毁该城市以前，意大利古城庞培一直是罗马帝国上流社会贵族们的度假天堂，也是罗马帝国的文化中心。

sentences.sContent: Mount Nyiragongo is one of the most dangerous volcanoes in the world - and scientists say it is only a matter of time before it makes the city below a modern day Pompeii.
sentences.sCn: 尼拉贡戈火山是世界上最危险的火山之一，科学家表示，山脚下的城镇重现庞培古城的悲剧只是时间的问题。
